official-title.#text:
To prohibit the Secretary of the Smithsonian Institution
		  from charging a fee for admission to any exhibit which is part of the permanent
		  collection of any museum or facility which is part of any bureau established in
		  or under the Smithsonian Institution, and for other purposes.
